original_text: Did he not make them one, with a portion of the Spirit in their union? And what was the one God seeking? Godly offspring. So guard yourselves in your spirit, and let none of you be faithless to the wife of your youth.
korean_text: 그에게는 영이 충만하였으나 오직 하나를 만들지 아니하셨느냐 어찌하여 하나만 만드셨느냐 이는 경건한 자손을 얻고자 하심이라 그러므로 네 심령을 삼가 지켜 어려서 맞이한 아내에게 거짓을 행하지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: Did he not make them one,
with a portion of the Spirit in their union?
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 연합에 성령의 일부가 함께 있지 않았느냐?

sentences.original_text: And what was the one God seeking?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 한 하나님께서 찾으신 것이 무엇이냐?

sentences.original_text: So guard yourselves in your spirit,
and let none of you be faithless
to the wife of your youth.
